name: Super 3D World Adventure
description:
This 3d mini game, is fun and hard to play.
You have to get coins to buy characters.
It has an infinite level.

HOW TO PLAY?
The character has to jump and avoid obstacles.
Space key = jump
Mouse left-click button = jump

TOOLS
Unity 2018.2.4
Blender
Gimp
Krita

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

LINUX
Download and extract tar.gz file.
Run the Super3DWorldAdventure.x86_64 binary file.

WINDOWS
Download and extract zip file.
Run the "Super World Adventure.exe" exe file.

ANDROID
Enable installing "Unknown sources" on Android.
Download and install apk file.

WEBSITE
http://www.luiscoding.com
